content: **super offer for you get all my toys patterns for $29 add all patterns to the basket and use code happy or use link https //www ravelry com/redeem/fionadolls code=happy** crochet your own adorable little plush pumpkin toy in just a 15 minutes it will be a cute souvenir valentines present keychain beautiful pincushion or baby toy this small plush heart pdf pattern is written in english using us crochet terms this easy-to-follow pattern includes 1 pdf files with detailed instructions of how to crochet this toy 4 pages and about 16 photos of process creating the item pattern level is for beginers this pattern doesn t include crochet lessons but only basic crocheting skills are needed chain single_crochet increasing and decreasing _____ details height of the toys is 7 5 cm = 3 inches ______ materials original yarn plush yarn dolce yarnart 120m 131 yds /100g in red color 748 - 10g you can substitute these yarns with another not plush bulky yarn with hook 4mm substitute plush yarn himalaya dolphin baby 120m 131 yds /100g velvet by bernat 288m 315yds /300g baby bee adore a ball 100g/84m ● hook us size g/6 4 mm ● fiber fill stuffing ● scissors ______ copyriht please do not copy or redistribute this pattern or claim it as your own you may sell your finished items if you like but please credit fionadolls as the designer ______ contact if you have any questions please feel free to contact me i will be happy to offer you my help i would really appreciate your feedback
